name: Regulator
description:
Bulk rename your color and text styles like a ðŸ’¯ boss.


Simply run this plugin in a file that has local styles and select which styles you want to rename. You can also numerate your names via $n and $nn, which will add numbers in ascending order of the list. You can also re-use the existing name via $& (just like Figma's bulk rename)
